hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #the Prelude of Light#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #the Requiem of Spirit# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that Barinade fears Deku Nuts.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Spirit Temple#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #the Prelude of Light#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path of time.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #2# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #a Map#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #2# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #Goron City#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #2# major items.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Fire Temple#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #Saria's Song#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #a Strength Upgrade# can be found in #the Market#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers #Dampé's Hut#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Heart Container#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Darunia's dance# leads to #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: Did you know that the solution to the Truth Spinner in Shadow Temple is never one of the two positions closest to the initial position?

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
